TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(object sender, AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs)
public delegate void AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs ^ e);
type AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler = delegate of obj * AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler>委派定義為<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>類別。 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>類別藉由指定名為的副程式**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>期間引發事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest>事件。
<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件使用目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。
您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件提供給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>屬性期間**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名識別時，才會引發事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>設定的組態項目為`true`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
